intro: While traveling in the wilderness, the characters fall into a sinkhole that opens beneath their feet, dropping them into the adventure location.
goal: Retrieve a stolen item hidden in the dungeon.

starting_area.desc: Circle, 40ft. diameter; one passage at each cardinal direction

N.desc: Continue straight 20ft., comes to a dead end.

passage.desc: Continue straight 20ft., then the passage turns right and continues 10ft.

S.desc: Continue straight 20ft., then the passage turns right and continues 10ft.

E.desc: Continue straight 20ft., side passage to the left, then an additional 10ft. ahead

W.desc: Continue straight 20ft., door to the left, then an additional 10 ft. ahead

578d0d4d056b1.content: Monster (pet or allied creature) guarding treasure
578d0d4d056b1.desc: Cistern or well for drinking water
578d0d4d056b1.purpose: Room containing a puzzle that must be solved to bypass a trap or monster
578d0d4d056b1.state: Furniture wrecked but stil l present

578d0d4d05b54.desc: Kennel for pets or guard beasts
578d0d4d05b54.purpose: Kennel for pets or guard beasts

578d0d4d05f24.purpose: Room containing a puzzle that must be solved to bypass a trap or monster

578d0d4d063c5.desc: Audience chamber, used to receive guests
578d0d4d063c5.purpose: Room containing a puzzle that must be solved to bypass a trap or monster

W.desc: Continue straight 20ft., comes to a dead end.

Passage.desc: Continue straight 20ft., then the passage turns left and continues 10 ft.

578d0d4d08da6.content: Monster (pet or allied creature) guarding treasure
578d0d4d08da6.purpose: Kennel for pets or guard beasts

578d0d4d09068.desc: Chapel where the lair's inhabitants worship

S.desc: Continue straight 20ft., side passage to the right. then an additional 10ft. ahead

578d0d4d093e3.desc: Kitchen for food storage and preparation

N.desc: Continue straight 20ft., door to the right, then an additional 10 ft. ahead

S.desc: Continue straight 20ft., door to the left, then an additional 10 ft. ahead

578d0d4d0be61.desc: Throne room where the lair's leaders hold court
578d0d4d0be61.purpose: Vault for holding important treasures, accessible only by locked or secret door (75 percent chance of being trapped)

S.desc: Continue straight 20ft., side passage to the left, then an additional 10ft. ahead

578d0d4d0c1ee.desc: Armory stocked with weapons and armor
578d0d4d0c1ee.purpose: Vault for holding important treasures, accessible only by locked or secret door (75 percent chance of being trapped)
